mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.datastore.layer

Class LayerHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.datastore.DaoHelper<Layer>
      • mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.datastore.layer.LayerHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDaoHelper<Layer>, IEventDispatcher<ILayerEventListener>

    public class LayerHelper
extends DaoHelper<Layer>
implements IEventDispatcher<ILayerEventListener>
    A utility class for accessing Layer data from the physical data model. The details of ORM DAOs and Lazy Loading should not be exposed past this class.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.datastore.DaoHelper
